title: Brian Wilson has died
author: coloneltcb
aiHeadline: The Beach Boys' Brian Wilson has joined the Choir Invisible at the age of 82, leaving behind a legacy of harmonious chaos and questionable lyrics.

title: Congratulations on creating the one billionth repository on GitHub
author: petercooper
aiHeadline: GitHub celebrates the creation of its 1,000,000,000th repository, which, let's be honest, probably contains a half-finished 'to-do' list and a README that says 'TODO: Write this.'

title: Research suggests Big Bang may have taken place inside a black hole
author: zaik
aiHeadline: Scientists propose that the Big Bang was actually the result of a black hole getting its facts wrong, which explains why the universe is such a mess.

title: Menstrual tracking app data is gold mine for advertisers that risks women safety
author: Improvement
aiHeadline: Study reveals that menstrual tracking apps are the ultimate goldmine for advertisers, because nothing says 'I care about you' like selling your personal cycle data to the highest bidder.

title: Left-Pad (2024)
author: oeitho
aiHeadline: In 2024, the world once again learned that sometimes, all you need is a function that adds spaces to the left of a string, and somehow, it breaks everything.
